trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /><see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os eventos de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /><see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged" /> e <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> é gerado quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controlar alterações.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> é gerado quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> alterações de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to process the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como processar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided at [How to: Automatically Resize Cells When Content Changes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido no [como: automaticamente redimensionar células quando o conteúdo é alterado no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode" /> property was previously set to any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" /> or the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> property was previously set to any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode" /> foi definida anteriormente para qualquer valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> diferente de <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" /> ou a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> foi definida anteriormente para qualquer valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> diferente de <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: When implementing a source for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> events, pass in `true` for `previousModeAutoSized` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> already had an automatic resizing mode and the new mode is different.
trans-unit.target: Ao implementar uma fonte para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos, passar `true` para `previousModeAutoSized` se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> já tinha um modo de redimensionamento automático e o novo modo é diferente.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> was previously set to automatically resize.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que especifica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> foi previamente definido para redimensionamento automático.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode" /> property was previously set to any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" /> or the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> property was previously set to any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode" /> foi definida anteriormente para qualquer valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> diferente de <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" /> ou a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> foi definida anteriormente para qualquer valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> diferente de <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" /> ou <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs> class is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> events, so this property relates specifically to the previous state of either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs> classe é usada com a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos, portanto, essa propriedade está relacionada especificamente para o estado anterior do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs.PreviousModeAutoSized%2A> property to check the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> value for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte exemplo de código usa o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs.PreviousModeAutoSized%2A> propriedade verificar anterior <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> valor para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided at [How to: Automatically Resize Cells When Content Changes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido no [como: automaticamente redimensionar células quando o conteúdo é alterado no controle de DataGridView dos Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md).
